table.name: vtiger_twostep_login
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_twostep_login` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `unique_id` tinytext NOT NULL, `code` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_twostep_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_twostep_settings` ( `id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `force` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `authenticator` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sms` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `email` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `bcodes` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `code_length` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '7', `bcode_length` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '6', `nums` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '10', `days` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '30', `titlename` tinytext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_twostep_users
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_twostep_users` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `unique_id` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `backup_codes` text, `used_codes` text, `secret` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `device` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bcode_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `auth_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
